creator: rapsys@free.fr
text:
I noticed a problem (i think) in the placement of mod_ssl default vhost by 
default...

The problem is that the config file of the module is correctly placed in :
/etc/httpd/modules.d/40_mod_ssl.conf

But the configuration of the vhosts is placed at the same place :
/etc/httpd/modules.d/41_mod_ssl.default-vhost.conf
instead of the the correct :
/etc/httpd/conf/vhosts.d/01_mod_ssl.default-vhost.conf

May you plz fix that ?
(for head too)

Config files as distributed from httpd.apache.org don't look anything like that,
so you are obviously having a problem with some vendor's repackaging of Apache
httpd.  Please report this to your vendor.
creator: slive@apache.org
